short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Rate Webpages based on occurace of Pizza

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pizza rate extension provides needed rating and statistics regarding the occurrence of "Pizza" in the content of a website.

You want to know if a website is good or not? Just click on the extensions icon and it will give you the statistics to make that decision.

Score out of 5 Pizzas, allows you to know which sites are faithful to the holy pizza, and which need more faith.
